channel.title: We need stratz! Come on add some!
channel.description:
Stratz for neuts - 1.Sellsword-Someone claims prince D1? No problem just before the end of the day day IM SELLSWORD GUARDING PRINCE. GO MURDER HIM LADS! Keep in mind that doing this as knight is also a valid strat but is risky because You may get exed the next day. Even though you may of killed a assassin and a alch.
Alch-Simple.Stoneskin D1. Yolo bomb N1-N2. If debuached claim that you are an bad alch and plz spare me. (5/10 times you survive by doing that)
Inquistor-Yolo N1. Claim bleeding/Nightshaded D2. If someone else claims they are bleeding or if there is a sheriff say it was a TB. Sorc shall COD eliminating a lot of people from the game, so you may murder him later
Merc-Guard prince ez.
Sorc-Pray Reaper-Pray harder for no drunks. Possessor-You are doomed sorry...

item.title: We need stratz! Come on add some!
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
Firelitten1:

1.Sellsword-Someone claims prince D1? No problem just before the end of the day day IM SELLSWORD GUARDING PRINCE. GO MURDER HIM LADS! Keep in mind that doing this as knight is also a valid strat but is risky because You may get exed the next day. Even though you may of killed a assassin and a alch.

Happy Hour says hi, not a bad fool strategy though.

item.title: We need stratz! Come on add some!
item.dc:creator: RawkHawk
item.description:
I’ve had that happen a few times to me. Unless the person claims to me first, I have no reason to respond. The only time I ever did was a princess who WoW (back when it said visits) and asked me who I was.

Read full topic

item.title: We need stratz! Come on add some!
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Regardless of class randomly whisper people for their class. As scorned prioritise your targets. You will often get them to claim no questions asked. Even when you don’t you can often get them to trade claims.

I do that often and Ive noticed that the people more likely to claim to a stranger are usually scum

Read full topic

as sheriff say people are unseen randomly so that you don’t have to check them

This should be added to the loading screen tips

item.title: We need stratz! Come on add some!
item.dc:creator: psychoneirik
item.description:
As scorned claim inquisitor, and around d3-d4 say in public “Im inquisitor I lost my immunity, both X and Y appeared as magic users, lets hang one of them and Ill kill the other tonight before I die”
For some reason this always works lol.

Read full topic
